meanings.definition: The process of coloring materials with a substance.
meanings.sent1: Dyeing can make a white shirt turn pink.
meanings.sent2: She learned dyeing to make her own colorful clothes.
meanings.sent3: The dyeing of the fabric turned out brighter than expected.
meanings.sent4: The dyeing of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The dyeing of the flowers made the garden come alive.

meanings.definition: The act of changing the color of something using dye.
meanings.sent1: The dyeing of the curtains made them match the sofa.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed dyeing his hair different colors for fun.
meanings.sent3: The dyeing of the cake created a beautiful ombre effect.
meanings.sent4: The dyeing of the water in the fountain made it look magical.
meanings.sent5: Her dyeing of the Easter eggs was a messy but fun activity.

meanings.definition: The art or practice of imparting color to objects.
meanings.sent1: Learning dyeing techniques can be a creative hobby.
meanings.sent2: The dyeing of the pottery added unique patterns to each piece.
meanings.sent3: His dyeing of the walls with different shades was a bold choice.
meanings.sent4: The dyeing of the hair with bright colors was a popular trend.
meanings.sent5: The dyeing of the fabric with natural dyes was eco-friendly.
